meanings.definition: A straight, level stretch of road or track used for drag racing.
meanings.sent1: The dragstrip was lined with excited spectators waiting for the race to start.
meanings.sent2: The dragstrip is where fast cars compete to see who is the quickest.
meanings.sent3: The dragstrip looked like a colorful snake winding through the desert.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a dragstrip, propelling her towards her goals at full speed.
meanings.sent5: The roar of engines on the dragstrip echoed through the valley.

meanings.sent1: He loves to dragstrip with his friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: They will dragstrip at the competition next month.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally challenged her grandma to a dragstrip in their neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The two rivals dragstriped towards the finish line, neck and neck.
meanings.sent5: The cars dragstriping down the track kicked up clouds of dust behind them.
